body.p:
Munfordville Hart Co Ky
Decr. 16th 1860
Dr. Sir

Enclosed I send you the petition of Mr. Henry M Tharp John L Tharp and Clayon C tharp praying the remission of a forfieted Bail bond Judgement rendered at the April Term 1860 of the Hart Equity & Criminal Court for $250.00 The petition is numerously signed by the neighbors of the petitioners They went bail for their brother who had a fight with another man his cousin -- their brother left the Country and the bond was forfeited the petitioners are poor and unable to pay the bond -- from all that I know of have heard of the case facts I have no doubt it is an extremely hard case

Hart E & C. Ct
Henry M Tharp
John L Tharp &
Clayton C Tharp
$200 } For Recog.
Petition
Remitted
B. M
Issd Feby 15. 1861
